SamPy.db.sqlite.parseASCIITitle¶

SamPy.db.sqlite.parseASCIITitle(filename, strip=True, lower=False, split=' ')¶

Parse a single line ascii information. Assumes that the first line is the header. Converts all column names to lower case.

If strip=True then will remove all dots and replace them with empty spaces.

Parameters:
  • filename (string) – name of the file to processed
  • strip (boolean) – a flag whether dots should be stripped from the name
  • lower (boolean) – a flag whether the column names should be converted to lower case
  • split (string) – character to be used for splitting the header string
Returns:

a list of column names
Return type:

list
